participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, enjoys exploring new experiences and values freedom.
participant_1.background: I dance on the weekends. I compete in dog agility classes. I don't care about fashion. I hate the color orange. I went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. My mother is very traditional while I prefer to be more free-spirited. My family and I are from India. My favorite music genre is death metal. I'm a swim coach at my local pool.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about music, enjoys connecting with others through art and food.
participant_2.background: My pet's name is Charlie. I produce music for artists. My favorite food is pizza. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic.
